Give one random friend +6 attack and +4 health.
Give one random friend +9 attack and +6 health.

name: Stegosaurus
effects: Give one random friend without held food +1 attack and +1 health until end of battle. Multiply with turn number.
Give one random friend without held food +2 attack and +2 health until end of battle. Multiply with turn number.
Give one random friend without held food +3 attack and +3 health until end of battle. Multiply with turn number.

name: Velociraptor
effects: Give Coconut to one random Strawberry friend.
Give Coconut to two random Strawberry friends.
Give Coconut to three random Strawberry friends.
